title: About Capstone Teams
content: Will Capstone teams get rejected if we don't have academic or gender diversity?

comments.body: If you wanna check just go ask the capstone coordinator. She will tell
For biotch there was no restriction like that. You can choose your own team.
These guidelines are often not enforced strictly. Don't stress too much over it.
In most cases you'll be fine.
if your mentor is okay with your team you'll be fine.
